messages.content: My order {{Order Number}} arrived damaged. What can I do?

We're sorry to hear that. Please request a return for {{Order Number}} via {{Online Company Portal Info}} and select 'Damaged item'. You can also call {{Customer Support Phone Number}} for quick assistance.
Can I get a refund for order {{Order Number}}?

Yes. To request a refund, log into {{Online Company Portal Info}}, open '{{Online Order Interaction}}', select {{Order Number}}, and choose 'Refund'. If you need help, call {{Customer Support Phone Number}}.
How do I return my order {{Order Number}}?
To return {{Order Number}}, log in to {{Online Company Portal Info}}, choose '{{Online Order Interaction}}', and select 'Return'. Print the return label and drop it at a partner location.
When is your customer support available?
Our support hours are {{Customer Support Hours}}. You can reach us at {{Customer Support Phone Number}} or via Live Chat on {{Website URL}}.
Can I include a gift message with my order?
Yes, add a personal message in the 'Gift message' field during checkout.
